line_1: Each Wish fulfils, and ev'ry Want relieves:
line_2: With God like Pity ev'ry Pray'r receives,

line_1: And certain plenty all his doubts relieves;
line_2: The farmer brings him home his yellow sheaves,

line_1: And certain plenty all his doubts relieves;
line_2: And his stuff'd barn the willing tax receives.
Tho' in his heart he weel believes,
